      • getBooksFromLatLong

        List<Book> getBooksFromLatLong(double latitude,
                               double longitude,
                               int radius,
                               int limit)
        Gets a List of books from a latitude and a longitude.
        Parameters:
        latitude - The latitude.
        longitude - The longitude.
        radius - The radius to search within.
        limit - The limit on how many results to return.
        Returns:
        books in the vicinity of the lat long position.

      • getBooksAndCitiesFromAuthor

        List<Book> getBooksAndCitiesFromAuthor(String name,
                                       int limit)
        Returns a List of books an author has written.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the author.
        limit - The limit on how many results to return.
        Returns:
        The books the author has written.

      • getCitiesFromBook

        List<Location> getCitiesFromBook(String title,
                                 int limit)
        Returns a List of books where cities mentioned in a book is in.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of a book.
        limit - The limit on how many results to return.
        Returns:
        The books where the cities are mentioned.

      • getAuthorsAndBooksFromCity

        List<Book> getAuthorsAndBooksFromCity(String name,
                                      int limit)
        Returns a List of books which has a specific location somewhere in the text.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of he location that is mentioned.
        limit - The limit on how many results to return.
        Returns:
        The books where the location is mentioned.
